item.title: Beta Start
item.description:
Hi,

some months ago i sponsored a Addon / Mod Page with a domain. Ultimately this project was a flop. So i had a useless Domain: www.webspell-cms.org

Nearly every week i had a request if i would sponsor a Website for a new Clan.

and some weeks later an idea materialized.

What about a webspell addon, where Users could create their own webspell site by just a few clicks? - with out any need to buy a professional designed and coded template or setting up a Freetemplate with FTP neither knowing how PHP or HTML works for self editing the page.

So i decided to create a Hosting addon for Webspell, where your users choose a template by a click and are able to edit the header. So ist quite simple but it took me a few weeks from this idea to a coded Beta version of this addon.

The code of the addon will be released in about 1-2 weeks

So if you want to gain a first look or experience try out the beta - Welcome on www.webspell-cms.org !

Use this link to unlock hosting :

http://www.webspell-cms.org/index....te=loginoverview&action=unlockhosting

Websites, where no registered user was logged in for 4 weeks, will be deleted for keep the server clean from dead sites!
item.author: service@webspell-cms.org (Henrik Oelze)

item.title: A little news update
item.description:
Actual situation

Create Hosting Projects: 100 %
Add new templates: 100%
Add new Webspell Versions: 100%
Installroutine: 100%
Template Changer 100%
Support Ticket Addon included: 100%

although i need to reconsider or optimize the needed structure of already coded templates for making it easier to include them into the system

Do you have any further ideas to the service or which features would you like to use?

untill open beta!


greetings Listener
item.author: service@webspell-cms.org (Henrik Oelze)

item.title: Free Webspell Hosting
item.description:
I soon proudly present you a website for free hosting of the famous Webspell CMS for clubs, guilds and clans.

You choose a Webspellversion (Clan or Society Edition), have a look for your favourite design and in a moment you have a full working Webspellpage - without having spent any time on setting up your webspace!

Recently im developing, but the most important features are already complete.

Soon there will be an open beta!
item.author: service@webspell-cms.org (Henrik Oelze)
